questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

You build solutions based on Microsoft Power Platform.

You want to generate predictions in Power Automate cloud flows by using machine learning (ML) models.

You need to choose how to build and train the ML models to perform predictions.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
AI Builder.
AI Builder is a service provided within the Power Platform that allows you to easily incorporate artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities into your applications and workflows without the need for extensive coding or data science expertise

Custom.
 for this specific scenario, you would use a custom connector to integrate the app's API with Power Automate and trigger the flow when an employee reports sick leave.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company uses a cloud app built by the IT department. The app has a publicly available API to manage employee availability.

You are creating an automated flow by using Power Automate that will send an email to an employee's manager when that employee is recorded as sick in the app.

You need to choose the appropriate type of connector for the flow.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

A company uses Power BI.

The company wants to use AI Insights in Power BI to make data-driven decisions.

You need to select the appropriate insight type for each requirement.

Which insight types should you select? To answer, drag the appropriate insight types to the correct requirements. Each insight type may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: these last questions mostly all have the right answers for once

questions.question_text:
You create a canvas app by using the option labeled Start from data. You connect a spreadsheet that contains customer records. The customer records are displayed in a list on a screen labeled Browse.

You need to modify a property of the control on the screen.

Which control should you modify?

discussion.content: Came on 28 June 2024, answer is "Gallery" as shown.

Selected Answer: D
The control that is most likely used to display a list of records in a canvas app is a Gallery.
A Gallery control allows you to show multiple records from a data source (in this case, customer records from the connected spreadsheet)

Selected Answer: D
D - Gallery to display as a list (collection) of records. 

Display form would show you specific details of that item when selected

YES, NO, NO.
1- Power Automate, can schedule cloud flows to start at a specific date and time.
2- Cloud flows can be exported directly from Power Automate and imported into another environment without the need for an Excel file.
3- Users do not necessarily have to create desktop flows to share them. They can share cloud flows as well. Additionally, sharing may require appropriate permissions, but it doesn't necessarily require being an administrator.
